titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on [(2S, 4R)/(2R, 4S)]/[(2R, 4R)/(2S, 4S) -1- {2-[4- (4-chloro-phenoxy) -2- chlorophenyl] -4-methyl-1, 3-dioxolan-2-yl-methyl}- 1H-1,2,4-triazole.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/5/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2000, the duty on ((2S,4R)-(2R,4S)- ((2R,4R)-(2S,4S)-1-(2-(4-(4-chloro phenoxy(-2-chlorophenyl)-4-methyl- 1,3-dioxolan-2-yl-methyl)-1H-1,2,4-triazole.
